attributes.action: Regulate the killing of fish, dolphins and wales in the UK Boarders
attributes.additional_details: To prevent the oceans being wiped out by humans
attributes.background: Prevent the amount of mammals killed in the UK waters

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about protection of marine species, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already a number of offences for killing, injuring or capturing certain species, including dolphins, porpoises and whales. You can find out more about these here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/protected-marine-species/cetaceans-dolphins-porpoises-and-whales

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban fishing on a third of UK coastal for fish repopulation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553334

Ban all fishing, for sport and food: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572791
